name: Machete Destroyer
description: The Machete otherwise, known as the Mashitty, is a hull that unlike all before has no shields till mk 4-5 hence the nick name mashitty.
obtaining: You can now only obtain the Machete (Mashitty) through campaigns.
tips-builds: The first thing to do with this ship is mk it up to 4 at least to get a shield slot. Only then will it be of any use.
author: Fuck Hound
